snippet.title: Hand of Fate 2: The Servant and the Beast DLC - Out now!
snippet.description:
Hand of Fate 2 expands once more with The Servant and the Beast DLC, out now on PC, PS4 and Xbox One! Switch release to follow shortly after. 

Venture into dark lands under the guidance of even darker masters, in pursuit of of honour and revenge! HoF2: The Servant and The Beast adds a brand new single-player challenge to Hand of Fate 2, and a brand new companion - Veles, the beast from beyond the veil! This DLC also includes the Combat Reforged update, bringing brand new mechanics to HoF2's arena-based combat, as well as a complete overhaul to the game's artefact system.
